casaxml.task:
importatca(files=None,vis=None, options=None,spw=None, nscans=None, lowfreq=None,highfreq=None,fields=None, edge=None, async=None): Import ATCA RPFITS file(s) to a measurement set
Imports an arbitrary number of ATCA RPFITS format data sets into a casa measurement set. If more than one band is present, they will be put in the same measurement set but in a separate spectral window. The task will handle both old ATCA and new CABB (after April 2009) archive data.
Name of input ATCA RPFits file(s)
Name of output visibility file (MeasurementSet)
Processing options: birdie, reweight, noauto, noxycorr, fastmosaic, hires, notsys (comma separated list)
Specify the spectral windows to use, default=all -1
Number of scans to skip followed by number of scans to read 0,0
Lowest reference frequency to select 0.1
Highest reference frequency to select 999
List of field names to select
Percentage of edge channels to flag. For combined zooms, this specifies the percentage for a single zoom window 8
importatca(['2001-01-02_1*.C999','2001-01-03_0*.C999'],'c999.ms', options='birdie,reweight',edge=10) Imports a number of ATCA RPFITS-format data sets into a casa measurement set. We are applying birdie flagging and lag spectrum reweighting (as approriate for old 33 channel continuum data) as well as flagging the 10% edge channels.
